questions.uddipok:
Change the sentences according to the directions:
(a) Everybody wants to make a good result in the examination. (Interrogative Sentence)
(b) It is not an easy task. (Affirmative Sentence)
(c) Being industrious, every student can make a good result. (Negative Sentence)
(d) The idle always lag behind. (Complex Sentence)
(e) They must work hard so that they can prosper in life. (Simple Sentence)
(f) Girls can work as much as boys. (Comparative Degree)
(g) Students should also observe the rules of health. (Passive Voice)
(h) An idle student leads a very miserable life. (Exclamatory Sentence)
(i) The light of prosperity can be seen by a hard working person. (Active Voice)
(j) By working hard, you can also change your condition. (Compound Sentence)

sub_questions.explanation:
(a) Who doesn't want to make a good result in the examination?
(b) It is a difficult task.
(c) Without being industrious, no student can make a good result.
(d)Those who are idle always lag behind.
(e) They must work hard to prosper in life.
(f) Girls can work more than boys.
(g) The rules of health should also be observed by students.
(h) What a miserable life an idle student leads!
(i) A hard working person can see the light of prosperity.
(j) You can work hard, and you can also change your condition.

To The Headmaster Dinajpur Zilla School Dinajpur
Subject: Application for Permission to Arrange a Tree Plantation Programme
Sir,
With due respect, we, the students of Dinajpur Zilla School, would like to inform you that we are interested in arranging a tree plantation programme in our school premises. questions.uddipok: Write a paragraph on "Your Visit to a Book Fair".

sub_questions.explanation:
A Book Fair I have Recently Visited

A book fair is a kind of fair where different types of books are displayed for sale. Nowadays, it has become very popular in our country. Last month, I visited a book fair. I went there with my elder brother. The fair was arranged on the occasion of 21t February, the International Mother Language Day. It was held at the Bangla Academy premises. As it was imy first visit to a book fair, I was really surprised when I entered the fair. There were hundreds of stalls at the fair. The environment was charming. The stalls were arranged systematically. There were information counters. There were also some stalls for taking snacks. I saw that all kinds of books such as fiction, drama, poetry, novel, biography, translation, children's literature, story books, etc. were available at the fair. I bought some books on science fiction and comics. After walking for a long time, we became tired. So, we entered a food stall and took some light food. Suddenly, I noticed a crowd in front of a stall. I went there and became surprised to see my favourite writer Abdul Hye Sikder. He was giving autographs. I also took an autograph. We also atterided a short seminar at the fair in which some renowned personalities of our country delivered speeches on the importance of books in our. life. After that, we left the fair, but I brought with me a lot of pleasant experiences.

questions.uddipok: Write a composition on The Season You Like Most.

sub_questions.explanation:
There are six seasons in Bangladesh, the land of natural beauty. They are summer, rainy, autumn, late autumn, winter and spring. Every season has its unique features. Of all these seasons I like the spring most.. This season consists of the Bangla months of Falgun and Chaitra. It is the best, the loveliest and the most charming of all the seasons. There are some specific reaons why I like the spring most.
To me, the winter is very cold, dull and lifeless. In summer, the scorching sun, hot days and nights make life miserable. The heavy rain and frequent floods in the rainy season bring great sufferings to the people. The autumn and the late autumn have also more or less the disadvantages like the summer, rainy and winter seasons. But the spring has none of the inconveniences of these seasons. Coming after winter, it captivates the hearts of all.
With the arrival of the spring, nature puts on a lively look. Everything in the nature looks fresh. The sky looks' clear and blue, trees put forth new leaves, and the flowers of charming colour and scent bloom in trees. Bees and butterflies hum and fly from one flower to another. During this season, gentle breeze begins to blow. Sweet twitters of birds are heard. The melodious notes of the cuckoo please our ears. All these charming and pleasing sights and sounds have a positive influence on our mind. Everywhere there is joy and mirth. People also enjoy a better health. Besides, during this time, various kinds of vegetables and fruits are also available. The season has a few disadvantages, too. During this season, some people suffer from diseases like diarrhoea, cholera, chicken-pox, etc.
In spite of its few disadvantages, its positive aspects are overwhelming. The convenience it offers fascinates all. That's why, I like the spring season most.
